name: And yet I go nowhere
description:
Banished to the twelfth dimension for your crimes against humanity, you will be forced to live out the rest of your days in exile.

Unless... You were to escape...

And yet i go nowhere is a short pixelated exploration game.

average playthrought time: 5-10 minutes

Use w,a,s,d to move.

Use the mouse to look around.

Left mouse to interact.
